name: Wizard Dungeon Escape 3D
description:
You are mysteriously thrown into a mazelike dungeon! Find your way out by solving puzzles using your to create a moving magical orb, which you can stop and start at will!

Content warning: game contains high heights.

Controls: 

ActionKeyboard & MouseControllerMove WASD LEFTSTICKShoot/Place Orb
LMB/RMBLB/RB Interact EX-buttonDestroy OrbRY-buttonRunLShiftB-buttonView ControlsTab Back-buttonPauseEscapeStart-button
